pages.text: The Quiver can be worn in the legs armor slot. In addition to providing a small amount of protection to the wearer, it also grants significantly increased damage in one's fist, allowing to do much more damage to creatures when bare-handed and launching them into the air.

pages.title: Affinity
pages.text: Being close to another player wearing $(l:constructs/clothing/mogs_quiver)Mog's Quiver$(/l) grants a buff in $(item)Resistance$().
